error.invalid: Please enter a valid 12-digit Aadhaar number

faceAuth.title: Face Authentication

guidelines.title: Face Authentication Guidelines
guidelines.checkbox: I have read and understood the guidelines.
guidelines.acceptRequired: Please accept the guidelines before proceeding.
guidelines.lighting: Ensure proper lighting - avoid dark or extremely bright environments
guidelines.coverings: Remove face coverings like masks, sunglasses, or heavy makeup
guidelines.camera: Face the camera directly and keep a neutral expression
guidelines.distance: Maintain a distance of 30-50 cm from the camera
guidelines.visibility: Ensure your face is clearly visible and not partially covered

faceAuth.lightingPrompt: Check Your Lighting, Ensure that your face isn't covered and is centered properly.
faceAuth.lightingPrompt2: Check Your Face Alignment and try again.

camera.enablePrompt: Please enable camera access in your browser settings and refresh the page.

feedback.tooBright: Too bright! Move away from direct light
feedback.tooDark: Too dark! Move to a brighter area

endPage.thankyou: Thank you for using Face Authentication Service

languageSwitcher.title: Select Your Preferred Language
languageSwitcher.description: Please choose your preferred language to continue
